column5: Country French cottage appointed with antique and vintage furniture and bedding. The cottage is situated in a 35 acre retreat just minutes to famous Round Top, historic Winedale and Burton. Take advantage of upcoming summer events: Festival Hill concerts in Round Top, Cotton Gin Festival and Shakespeare in Winedale. Wi-Fi is provided.   Guests have access to the property to go for nature walks, enjoy the 1.5 acre pond and view many species of birds that live year round. It is enchanting.
column8: Falcon Hill (5 mins from Round Top)
